title: Grand Opening of LEVELthirty Lounge & Bar Courtyard by Marriott Hong Kong Sha Tin’s newest rooftop bar
text:
Grand Opening of LEVELthirty Lounge & Bar Courtyard by Marriott Hong Kong Sha Tin’s newest rooftop bar Grand Opening of LEVELthirty Lounge & Bar Courtyard by Marriott Hong Kong Sha Tin’s newest rooftop bar Details Category: Hotel Created on Thursday, 30 July 2015 09:45 Courtyard by Marriott Hong Kong Sha Tin has announced the grand opening of LEVELthirty Lounge & Bar, the rooftop venue which graces its top floor on the 30th, with both outdoor and indoor space.On 28 July 2015 (Tuesday), LEVELthirty Lounge & Bar hosted an evening of entertainment starting with a cocktail reception from 6.30pm accompanied by a fantastic new menu of Western and Asian Tapas and various live cooking stations. Mr. Peter Sih, General Manager of the hotel made a toast together to the guests to kick start the grand opening followed by a lucky draw to add just a little surprise to the night. 
Served as the ideal gathering place for business associates, family and friends, LEVELthirty will boast an extravagant array of gourmet food and tapas to suit every taste, complemented by an extensive wine list, signature cocktail and champagne. LEVELthirty is a great place to enjoy perfectly curated food and beverage with panoramic views of the Sha Tin Racecourse and Tolo Harbour. Whether you plan to throw a birthday bash or a surprised wedding proposal party, LEVELthirty and the adjacent world class meeting venues is the place to host your private event and enjoy heartening food with your choice of fine wine to add some glamor to the occasion. Happy hour spans from 5pm to 8pm daily, so come early to secure your favourite seat, be it the comfy sofa seats overlooking the Racecourse or the bar tables close to the wine dispenser perfect for wine lovers!
